participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and hardworking, Emma enjoys outdoor activities and has a strong connection to nature.
participant_1.background: i like to ride horses. i help tend the fields. i like to listen to rock music while working. i have three arabian horses. my father is a farmer.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Practical and down-to-earth, Jake finds joy in his work and values a simple, rural lifestyle.
participant_2.background: i work my parents farms. i drive a big truck and live in country. i have a pet cow. i am an electrician.
